title: Your weather update for Monday (14)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Meteorology announced that showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in Galle, Matara and Nuwara-Eliya districts after 2.00 p.m on Monday (14).
A few showers will occur in the Eastern and Uva provinces and in Hambanthota district.
General public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
Cut taxes on fuel, says Gammanpila while asking why SLPP is silent on price hike?
